prompt_update: You will receive a text. Your task is to continue this text. Just output your new text, nothing else. Here is the text:
initial_story:
You are certainly no friend of mine. You have accused me of lying about what you had said, and run away when I proved by actual quotation that the accusation was false. We both know that, even though you praise humility, you are not humble enough to apologize.

 You sneered at my combat experience, saying "A lot of so called "combat veterans" of Vietnam smelled more perfume from call girls than they smelled cordite" and "So when you were an Army officer in Vietnam (even though you spent your time inside of Danang airbase, with at least two battalions of infantry marines on the wire ) what was the combat load for M-16 ammo per soldier on a daily patrol?" An actual friend would not have written such things.

No, you are no friend of mine, you ignorant, arrogant, hypocritical blow-hard. You should be able to guess that I do not feel friendly towards you
stories: after your disrespectful behavior. It is clear that you lack the basic decency and respect that true friendship requires. Your words and actions have shown your true colors, and I have no interest in maintaining any sort of relationship with someone like you. Good riddance.

I deserve to be treated with kindness and respect, and I will not tolerate anything less. It is time to part ways and move forward separately. I wish you the best in your future endeavors, but I have no desire to have you in my life any longer. It's time to surround myself with positive and supportive individuals who truly value and appreciate me. Goodbye.

I am choosing to prioritize my own well-being and happiness over anything else. Thank you for the memories we shared, but it is time for me to focus on my own personal growth and journey. I hope you find the same peace and fulfillment that I am seeking. Goodbye.

I know this decision may come as a surprise, but it is something I have been contemplating for a while now. I believe that it is important to take care of ourselves first before we can truly be there for others. I appreciate all the good times we had together, but this is something I need to do for myself. I wish you nothing but the best in your own journey and hope that we can both find the happiness and peace we deserve. Farewell.

I hope you understand that this decision was not made lightly, and it is not a reflection of our time together. I have learned a lot from our relationship and I will always cherish the memories we shared. It is time for me to focus on my own well-being and personal growth. I hope that we can both grow from this experience and find the strength to move forward in a positive way. Thank you for everything, and I wish you nothing but happiness in the future. Goodbye.

I know this may be difficult to accept and process right now, but please know that I have thought long and hard about this decision. I truly believe that it is the best choice for both of us in the long run. I am grateful for the time we spent together and the love we shared. I will always hold a special place in my heart for you. I hope that in time, we can look back on our time together with fondness and appreciation for the lessons we learned. Take care of yourself, and remember that you deserve all the happiness in the world. Goodbye.

I know this may come as a shock, but I have realized that our paths are no longer aligned. It was not an easy decision to make, but I believe it is the right one for both of us. I will always cherish the memories we created and the love we shared. I hope that one day we can find peace in our hearts and be grateful for the experiences we had together. Please take care of yourself and know that you are deserving of all the love and happiness in the world. Goodbye.

I know this may be difficult to hear, but I truly believe that this separation is necessary for our individual growth. I wish you nothing but the best in your future endeavors, and I hope you find the happiness and fulfillment you deserve. Take care of yourself, and remember that you are strong enough to overcome any challenges that may come your way. Goodbye.

I know that this decision may be hard to accept right now, but I truly believe that in the long run, we will both be better off for it. I have faith that we will both find our own paths to happiness and fulfillment. Take care of yourself and know that you are never alone. Goodbye for now, but not forever.

I will always hold a special place for you in my heart, and I will never forget the love and joy you brought into my life. Farewell for now, but I hope our paths may cross again someday. Take care and may you find the happiness you seek.

Farewell for now, my dear, and may your journey be filled with love, happiness, and fulfillment. Take care and know that you will always have a special place in my heart.
